query:
CREATE TABLE `users` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `username` varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `password` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `name` text,
  `email` varchar(320),
  `role` enum('user', 'admin') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user',
  `isActive` enum('yes', 'no') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'yes',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `lastSignedIn` timestamp NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2xtgvXGdr7mxJSP.root --database HgGpRPs4xs9xrzjfX4xmFY --execute CREATE TABLE `users` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `username` varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `password` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `name` text,
  `email` varchar(320),
  `role` enum('user', 'admin') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user',
  `isActive` enum('yes', 'no') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'yes',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `lastSignedIn` timestamp NULL
);
